User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Aether Co-Pilot application.

clerkId.description: Clerk ID associated with the user for authentication.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was last updated.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a chat message within the Cognitive Memory Core.

content.description: The content of the chat message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was sent.

isUserMessage.description: Indicates whether the message was sent by the user or the AI assistant.

userId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

Session.title: Session
Session.description: Represents a chat session with the AI assistant.

startTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the session started.

sessionName.description: The name of the session given by the user.

CodeSnippet.title: CodeSnippet
CodeSnippet.description: Represents a generated code snippet from Quantum CodeForge™.

id.description: Unique identifier for the code snippet.

userId.description: Reference to the User who generated the code. (Relationship: User 1:N CodeSnippet)

language.description: The programming language of the code snippet.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the code snippet was generated.

description.description: Description of what the code snippet does.

StudyNote.title: StudyNote
StudyNote.description: Represents a study note created within Knowledge Navigator™.

id.description: Unique identifier for the study note.

userId.description: Reference to the User who created the note. (Relationship: User 1:N StudyNote)

content.description: The content of the study note (e.g., summary, answers).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the study note was created.

sourceDocument.description: URI of the document that the study note is based on.
